channel.title: Bizkit the Sleeprunning dog
channel.description:
Hahaha, poor dog.
This one starting to run, then running full force and getting up and running into the wall, thus waking him up. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LzMAXqu8qU
This one running full force in his dream then wakes up normally after almost completing a circle: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6QrGDmJdaeI&feature=related
This one is kinda creepy, The dog runs and slows down repeatedly then gets up with its body locked and barks then stand there and wakes up: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-0dzKH1Rfs&feature=related
I thought it may have been a trick but in the first one he twitches into the running and its probably very hard to train a dog for that.

item.title: Bizkit the Sleeprunning dog
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I’ve seen the first one before, but not the others. Those were hilarious

Read full topic

item.title: Bizkit the Sleeprunning dog
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

Omg, those were so funny! My Lab sometimes starts to twitch and snarl while she sleeps and I just pat her on the stomach to wake her up and she is fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Bizkit the Sleeprunning dog
item.dc:creator: @Lil_Goon Lil Goon
item.description:
@Lil_Goon wrote:

I don’t blame him. Can’t escape the dreams.
